name: Shooter Loop
description:
2D Action shooter game with tanks, helicopters, turrets

- Run & Gun
- Different enemy types
         - Enemy soldiers
         - Turrets
         - Tanks
         - Helicopters
- Playable with two different soldiers
- Two different maps
- Lots of objects you can interact
         - Sandbags
         - Ropes
         - Pools
         - Ladders
         - Spikes
         - Bridges
- Background music and sounds
- Trophies and scores table
- Your aim is destroying as much as enemy troops possible.
- You will get score when you destroy enemies.
- Worlds will be generated randomly every time when you enter the game. You will see different world each time.
- Enemy numbers will increase when you go forward.
